name: NATIONAL MUSLIM BUSINESS COUNCIL
description: NMBC was established to help Muslim and non Muslims start businesses.
sampleDescriptions: Our mission together will be to continue to develop faith based/ Muslim businesses and business owners seeking to do business in the United States.
